attributes.action: PRISONERS NEED TO EARN THEIR KEEP
attributes.additional_details:
When you commit a crime, you loose your rights and need to pay for what youve done,
It costs roughly £37,500 to keep 1 person for a year in a prison, who pays for it??? they are in better accomodation than most, fed better, kept warm, given free tv/satellite/xbox,
I wish i earnt £37,500,  we need people to work for their keep, maybe to work making things that benefit the UK and learn new skills, maybe making Britain Great again,
Id be happy if i go to jail to work, 40 hours a week,
I know this country has no money and this would cost lots to impliment

Work this out £37,500 x 86,821 = £3,255,787,500
YOU READING THIS ARE PAYING TOWARDS THIS AMOUNT
